Description:
Detects when events are deleted in Kubernetes.
An adversary may delete Kubernetes events in an attempt to evade detection.


Author: Leo Tsaousis (@laripping)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Kubernetes Events Deleted
Query: sourcetype='kubernetes-audit' eql select * from _source_ where verb = 'delete' and objectref.resource = 'events'
